public void combine(int size) {
    IType t = new IType() {

        private String value = "";

        @Override
        public void acc(String value) {
            this.value += value;
        }

        @Override
        public String get() {
            return value;
        }

    };
    t.acc("a");
    t.acc("b");
    System.out.println(t.get());
}
